title: Fundamentals of Methods
description: Rigorous treatment of methods theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Fundamentals of Analysis
description: Advanced exploration of analysis covering current research and industry practices.

title: Workshop
description: Comprehensive study of workshop with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Applications
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in applications. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Applications
description: Comprehensive study of applications with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Advanced Workshop
description: Comprehensive study of workshop with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Methods
description: Interdisciplinary approach to methods combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Special Topics in Practice
description: Rigorous treatment of practice theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: VADA 300 and senior standing or graduate status
